feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and question marks consistently.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar lexical choices and grammatical structures.

feature3.explanation: Both texts have a similar sentence structure and coherence.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were present in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, it is moderately likely that the two texts were written by the same author.
